    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)

      • start

        public void start(Stage primaryStage)
           throws java.lang.Exception
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • initUI

        private void initUI()
        Initializes the gui. Sets the element's properties and packs them into their parent-containers.

      • setupListeners

        private void setupListeners()
        Creates all EventHandlers for the Gui-elements.

      • onButtonStep

        private void onButtonStep(ActionEvent event)
        This method is called whenever the Button "Step" is clicked. It performs a single transition in the machine.

      • onButtonStart

        private void onButtonStart(ActionEvent event)
        This method is called whenever the Button "Start" is clicked. It starts the ongoing execution of steps until an accepted state has been reached in the machine.

      • onButtonStop

        private void onButtonStop(ActionEvent event)
        this method is called whenever the Button "Stop" is clicked. It stops the running execution of the machine if possible.

      • onButtonLoad

        private void onButtonLoad(ActionEvent event)
        This method is called whenever the Button "Load" is clicked. It uses the machine-definition from the appropriate TextArea to try to create a machine based on that definition.

      • onButtonOpen

        private void onButtonOpen(ActionEvent event)
        This method is called whenever the Button "Open" is clicked. It shows a file selection dialog and loads the file's content into the appropriate TextArea

      • onSliderDelay

        private void onSliderDelay( observable,
                 java.lang.Number oldValue,
                 java.lang.Number newValue)
        This method is called every time the slider has been moved/changed.

      • machineStepLoop

        private void machineStepLoop()
        This method is called periodically after the Button "Start" has been clicked.

      • step

        private void step()
        Performs a single transition on the machine. Handles all possible errors.

      • afterTransition

        private void afterTransition(java.lang.String stateBeforeTransition)
        This method should be called after every transition as it does all the necessary things post-transition.

      • addStatusText

        private void addStatusText(java.lang.String data)
        Adds a new status message to the statusText-TextArea
